wblut.hemesh

Class HEC_RevolvePolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HEC_Creator
      • wblut.hemesh.HEC_RevolvePolygon

  • public class HEC_RevolvePolygon
extends HEC_Creator
    The Class HEC_RevolvePolygon.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte, W:Blut Turns a single WB_Polygon2D into a mesh. If a thickness is specified the result is a solid, otherwise it's a surface.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class wblut.hemesh.HEC_Creator
